/*! override bootstrap - fix for the many EVIL "hidden" classes around phpBB. 
 *  They should be removed from the block and not overriden by display:block; :-/ What you gonna do? They do not listen
 *
 */ 
 /*! ----------
.hidden {
  display: none !important;
}
------------------------------ */
.hidden {
  display: none;
}
